subject: Medical check-up of regular /deputationists employees.
text: s7dr <redr rorraf  yriferan<ut PHONE 91-11-5074100/5074200 (3v 5raa7 3R ITaTM TATTT) Fax 91-11-5093507/5093514 Extn, 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, SECTOR-10, DWARKA, NEW DELHI-11004S No. 11041/21/2002-Admn -III 1,2003 44// POLICY MATTERS:ADMINSTRATIONFINANCE4/2003) (Decision taken on Admn Division '$ File No. [1017/1/2001-Admn -[ ) Subject: MEDICAL CHECK-UP It has been decided to have comprehensive Health Check-up of the employees of NHAL, subject to the following conditions The scheme will be applicable only to the regular employees of NHAL and to those who are on deputation to NHAL AlI new entrants   (regular/deputationists) will  undergo the Medical Check-up within six months of their joining, irrespective of age (iii) Such emnployees who have joined to six months, S0 far have not availed the facility, will undergo the check-up by 30.06.2003. (iv) Those who are above 40 years of age will undergo the check-up once in two years. 2 The following approved hospitals in Delhi have agreed to conduct Medical Health Check-up as per their scheme mentioned hereunder. In respect of the check-up done in any of these approved hospitals, the payment will be directly released to the concerned hospitals by the Authority on receipt of' bills   and medical   reports of the concerned employees. Batra Hospital and Medical Research Centre, 1, Tughalakabad Institutional Area M.B: Road New Delhi-IO 062 Tests 1 History and full general examination 2 Urine and Stool-Routine Examination 3 Eye-Examination Ophthalmology Assessment 4 X-Ray Chest (P.A . View) 5 Haematology (8 tests on Sysmex 180, including Hb, TLC, DLC, MCV, MCHC, Platelet Count; ESR and Blood Group Biochemistry on Hitachi 70SE Auto Analyser, 16 tests including Glucose fasting & PP and Lsuta 1 - May prior but,
